why_bitcoin.title: Why Bitcoin?
why_bitcoin.content:
🌍 *Why Use Bitcoin?*

Many people don't understand why Bitcoin is important. Here are the key reasons:

🔐 *Financial Freedom:*
- Bitcoin is not controlled by banks or governments
- You alone control your money

💸 *Fast and Cheap Payments:*
- Send money to anyone worldwide instantly
- Very low fees compared to banks or traditional services

📉 *Protection Against Inflation:*
- Bitcoin cannot be printed endlessly like traditional currencies
- Only 21 million will ever exist

📱 *Accessible to Everyone:*
- Even in rural areas, you can use Bitcoin with a mobile phone

_Bitcoin is a new form of money that gives you freedom, security, and the ability to participate in the digital economy._
